title: WEMYSTIC EN Personal data
content:
Personal data

The Subscriber may exercise their rights of access, rectification, cancellation and opposition regarding to the process of their personal data. You can also exercise your right to personal data portability and personal data forgetting.

The exercise of rights should take place through any means that you consider relevant:

  1. Through the unsubscribe links found in all communications sent via email;
  2. By e-mail: “info@wemystic.com“;
  3. By writing a statement and addressing it to WeMystic, SA – Rua Alfredo Allen and 455, 461, floor 3, room 4200-135 3.27 Porto, Portugal. Telephone contact: +351 300404472.

Please provide first name, last name, date of birth, email address, phone number, country of residence, the reason for your request and the right(s) to be exercised. If exercising the right of erasure, opposition and similar requests, please also provide an identity document.
